name: ouroboros - snake cross pacman
description:
half started jam entry for #jimjam2

Was meant to be a cross between snake and pacman, but bugs and time didn't help to get to what I envisioned. 

So there is just a single basic level, eat the energy to spawn other snake, once y ou have eaten all the available pellet, a power pellet appear, all you have to do is eat it, and eat a first snake. Happy end :)
